activity_name: Record the data of each patient

substeps.description: Clerk greets the patient and confirms the purpose of registration
Clerk requests patient's personal identification documents
Clerk collects and verifies basic patient information including name, surname, and SSN
Clerk temporarily notes the collected data for system entry

activity_name: Register the SSN of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk accesses the hospital's patient registration system
Clerk enters the patient's SSN into the designated field
Clerk validates the SSN format and checks for duplicates in the system
Clerk saves the SSN entry and logs any validation results

activity_name: Register the Name of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk navigates to the name entry section in the registration system
Clerk inputs the patient's first name accurately
Clerk reviews the entry for spelling and formatting errors
Clerk confirms and saves the name entry

activity_name: Register the Surname of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk locates the surname field in the registration interface
Clerk enters the patient's surname precisely
Clerk checks for any inconsistencies or typos
Clerk submits and stores the surname data
Clerk compiles all registered patient data into the referral template
Clerk reviews the document for completeness and accuracy
Clerk sends the document to the printer
Clerk collects the printed referral and attaches it to the patient's file

activity_name: Archive the record in file system

substeps.description: Clerk finalizes the patient record in the system
Clerk saves the record to the designated file system location
Clerk updates the associated database with the new record details
Clerk verifies the archiving process and logs completion
